title: Middlekauff: Black Monday coach firings; Mayock and Gruden; Mike Zimmer living in the past; Notre Dame a CFB Playoff fraud; NFL Playoff preview
itunes:title: Middlekauff: Black Monday coach firings; Mayock and Gruden; Mike Zimmer living in the past; Notre Dame a CFB Playoff fraud; NFL Playoff preview
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2.  Middlekauff talks Black Monday coach firings, Mike Mayock's hiring as Raiders' GM, why Mike Zimmer needs to get with the times in the modern passing NFL, why the Colts can make a playoff run, why Notre Dame doesn't belong in the CFB Playoff, Kyler Murray showing out against Bama, looks at the NFL Playoffs, and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
